review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Appreciate your efforts for finding and being on The Path as we enter the 36th week
            of the “Steps\" program. Where you have fallen short, do not beat yourself up, but instead, hold the
            intention to keep working on the process. It’s always possible to find The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Start the week by holding the intention to learn and grow in some way. Nothing remains the same. You either
            move forward or backward. Find your way to move forward today (Pillar #1)
step_of_the_day.content:
"Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don't wish it were easier; wish you
            were better." Jim RohnYour strength is in building a strong foundation. A strong foundation is built on trusting yourself.
            Trusting yourself is developed through doing what you say you are going to do and saying you are going to do
            what needs to be done. This process is built on holding yourself accountable from a place of love. The
            result is self-confidence.All the while, be careful that you are not being influenced by a negative internal voice

action_step: Identifying what needs to be done today and follow through, so that you can strengthen your foundation.
journal_entry: Write about this process of strengthening your foundation and trusting yourself and feeling self-confident.
